'''Norse Mythology Skins''' is a [[skin pack]] that includes 4 skins themed around Nordic mythology and was created by [[4J Studios]]. It is an addition to the [[Norse Mythology Mash-Up]], which launched earlier in the same month, and was released as the fifth gift in the "12 Days of Minecraft" [[Marketplace]] promotion.<ref name=TWEET>{{Tweet|Minecraft|945307432191975425|It’s the fifth of our 12 free Minecraft gifts. This one’s from the lovely folks at @4JStudios. What’s inside? Let’s just say it’s your “Loki” day! Get it while you can – free today only!}}</ref>
